actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution electing certain Representatives to the Committees on Government Operations and Small Business.

summary.text: Elects the following Representatives to the following committees: (1) Beau Boulter, of Texas, and John E. Grotberg, of Illinois, to the Committee on Government Operations; and (2) Stewart B. McKinney, of Connecticut, and Larry Combest, of Texas, to the Committee on Small Business.

titles.title: A resolution electing certain Representatives to the Committees on Government Operations and Small Business.
